alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 4:17AM AKST until January 27 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Highway past mile point 5 including Klukwan * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to noon AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All areas expected to start as snow, but Haines is expected to change to rain Friday afternoon or evening. The Haines Highway including Klukwan will likely stay snow into Saturday before starting to mix with rain Saturday morning, but could start mixing sooner leading to lower snow totals.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
